section.p: To renounce the worship of Alvir and Valmir, you must pay 30 Shards in compensation to the priesthood.
The priest simply points to a ship limping into harbour - its shattered masts, torn sails and battered hull mute testimony to its storm-tossed voyage.
‘The captain did not revere the Twin Gods,’ whispers the coral-jewelled priest darkly.

Do you want to change your mind?
If you are determined to renounce your faith,
pay the 30 Shards and delete Alvir and Valmir
from the God box on your Adventure Sheet.
.
